name: gatsby-plugin-transition-link
description: A link component for page transitions in gatsby.
author: Tyler Barnes <tyler@known.design>

scripts.develop: cp -rf package.json src && cd example && gatsby develop
scripts.copy-npm-files: cp -rf package.json lib && cp -rf readme.md lib
scripts.build: rm src/package.json || true && yarn clean-lib && babel --preset preset-env src --out-dir lib --ignore __tests__ && yarn copy-npm-files
